question: Iyo banyuze iruhande rw'inkomyi abanyamaguru bangomba gukikira banyuze mu muhanda, abayobozi b'ibinyabiziga bagomba gusiga umwanya ufite ubugari bwa
answers: Metero 3 byibura hagati yabo n'iyo nkomyi
Metero 1 byibura hagati yabo n'iyo nkomyi
Metero 1 na cm 55 hagati yabo n'iyo nkomyi

question: Amatara ndanga burumbarare, agomba kubonwa nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye n'umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga kiri mu ntera ya

Za otobisi zigenewe gutwara abanyeshuri zishobora gushyirwaho amatara abiri, amyatsa, rimwe riri imbere irindi riri inyuma kugirango zerekane ko zihagaze no kwerekana ko bagomba kwitonda, Ayo matara agomba kumurika muri metero 100 muri buri ruhande rw'aho zihagarara, agira amabara akurikira

Kubyerekeye kwerekana ibinyabiziga n'ukumurika kwabyo ndetse no kwerekana ihindura ry'ibyerekezo byabyo, birabujijwe gukora andi matara cyangwa utugarura rumuri, uretse ibitegetswe, ariko ibyo ntibireba amatara akurikira
Icyapa kitwa Ntihanyurwa mu byerekezo byombi gifite ubuso bw'amabara akurikira

Inyuguti RL ziri hejuru y'imibare 4 kuva kuri 0001 kugeza 9999 Ariko Inyuguti RL zishobora gukurikirwa n'iriya mibare ine iyo umwanya wateganyirijwe icyapa inyuma uhagije bityo icyapa cy'inyuma kikagira ingero zimwe n'icy'imbere, ni ku byapa by'ibinyabiziga bikurikira
answers: Ibinyabiziga byavanywe mu muhanga n'abacuruzi babyo

question: Kubyerekeye kwerekana ibinyabiziga n'ukumurika kwabyo ndetse no kwerekana ihindura ry'ibyerekezo byabyo, birabujijwe gukora andi matara cyangwa utugarura rumuri, uretse ibitegetswe, ariko ibyo ntibireba amatara akurikira
Icyapa kivuga inzira y'amatungo itegetswe kirangwa
answers: Ishusho y'uruziga ubuso bwera ikiranga ishusho y'inka mu ibara ry'umukara
Ishusho ya mpandeshatu ubuso bwera umuzenguruko utukura ikiranga ishusho y'inka mu ibara ryera
Ishusho y'uruziga ubusa bw'ubururu ikiranga ishusho y'inka mu ibara ryera
Ishusho mpandeshatu ndinganire y'umutuku ubuso bw'ubururu inka mu ishusho ry'ibara ryera

question: Amatara ndanga mbere n'aya ndanga nyuma y'imodoka zitarengeje metero 6 z'uburebure na metero ebyiri z'ubugari habariwemo imitwaro kandi ntakindi kinyabiziga kiziritseho, ashobora gusimburwa n'amatara yo guhagarara umwanya munini, iyo ibyo binyabiziga bihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini mu nsisiro bibangikanye ku ruhande rw'umuhanda, ayo matara arangwa n'amabara akurikira
answers: Akaba year cyangwa asa n'umuhondo imbere
Aba ari umutuku cyangwa umuhondo inyuma
Ibiri haruguru byose ni ibisubizo by'ukuri

question: Ubugari bw'imizigo yikorewe n'amagare na velomoteri kimwe na romoroki zikuruwe n'ibyo binyabiziga ntibushobora kurenza
Ibinyabiziga bigomba kugira itara ry'ubururu rimyatsa ribonesha impande zose, ni ibi bikurikira
Iyo igenda mu nzira nyabagendwa imikumbi, igomba kugabanywamo udutsiko tugizwe
answers: N'inyamaswa zitarenze 20 kandi zitandukanijwe n'intera ya metero 10
N'inyamaswa zitarenze 10 kandi zitandukanijwe n'intera ya metero 20
N'inyamaswa zitarenze 8 zitandukanyijwe n'intera ya metero 10

question: Iyandikwa ry'ibinyabiziga by'abantu bikorera ku giti cyabo cyangwa ibya za ambasade cyangwa imiryango ifite ubusonerwe nk'ubwa za ambasade no ku bakozi b'izo za ambasade n'iyo miryango risabwa ibiro by'imisoro. Ese iyo ari gishya, iryo saba riherekezwa n'ikihe cyemezo?
answers: Ibiri haruguru byose ni ibisubizo by'ukuri

question: Imirongo y'ingabo z'igihugu zigendera kuri gahunda n'utundi dutsiko twose tw'abanyamaguru nk'imperekerane cyangwa udutsiko tw'abanyeshuri, iyo bidashoboka kubona muri metero 200 bigaragazwa n'itara ryera ritwariwe ku ruhande rw'ibumoso imbere, n'aho inyuma, n'itara ry'umutuku ariko iyo uburebure bw'iyo mirongo cyangwa bw'utwo dutsiko burenga metero 6, impande zatwo cyangwa zayo zigaragazwa k'uburyo bukurikira.
Iyo hatarimo indi myanya birabujijwe gutwara ku ntebe y'imbere y'imodoka abana badafite imyaka ikurikira

Ahari hejuru cyane y'ubuso bumurika h'amatara ndanga mbere na ndanga nyuma, ntihashobora kuba aharenze metero 1 na santimetero 90 hejuru y'ubutaka, iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye ku byerekeye utugarurarumuri ubwo buhagarike ntibushobora kurenga

Uretse ku byerekeye imihanda irombereje y'ibisate byinshi n'imihanda y'imodoka, igice cy'umuhanda kiri hakurya y'umurongo mugari wera udacagaguye ucibwa ku muhanda ngo ugaragaze inkombe mpimbano, kigenewe ibi bikurikira
Ibinyabiziga bikoreshwa butagisi bitegerereza abantu munzira nyabagendwa bishobora gushyirwaho itara ryerekana icyo bikoreshwa, iryo tara rishyirwaho ku buryo bukurikira
answers: Ni itara ry'icyatsi rishyirwa imbere ryerekana ko ikinyabiziga kitakodeshejwe
Ni itara ry'icyatsi rishyirwa ibumoso ryerekana ko ikinyabiziga kitakodeshejwe
Ni itara ry'umuhondo rishyirwaho ryerekana ko ikinyabiziga kitakodeshejwe

question: Iyo hatari utuyira two ku mpande z'umuhanda cyangwa inkengero zigiye hejuru, cyangwa bidashobora kugendwa, abanyamaguru bagomba kunyura aha hakurikira
answers: Mu tuyira turi ku musezero w'umuhanda

question: Isonga y'impombo yohereza ibyotsi ntishobora kwerekezwa aha hakurikira
